features.title: Block /wp-admin/ for non-Administrator roles
features.description: Critical security hardening - only Administrator role can access WordPress admin panel

features.title: Role Capabilities Matrix
features.description: Define role capabilities and access boundaries for all 5 custom roles

features.title: CandidateID Strategy
features.description: Define unique identifier system (TD-YYYY-NNNN) for cross-system tracking

features.title: CV Lifecycle Policy
features.description: Define CV storage, archiving, and deletion policies for GDPR compliance

features.title: Environment Configuration (td-env-config.php)
features.description: Deploy environment-specific configuration as mu-plugin for automatic loading
features.notes: Defines TD_PERSON_REGISTRATION_FORM_ID and other env-specific constants

features.title: Forminator Upload Handler
features.description: Custom file upload handler for Forminator forms with per-form directory logic
features.notes: Activated on production - handles CV uploads to /uploads/people/

features.title: Custom Page Access Control (template_redirect hook)
features.description: Role-based page access control using custom template_redirect hook - Manager/Operator pages restricted by role
features.notes: Manager pages (386, 469, 670) for td_manager/administrator only. Operator pages (299, 666) for td_operator/administrator only. Will migrate to plugin in v3.7.0+.

features.title: Manager Actions Page (User Request Management)
features.description: Split Manager Admin into Admin (dashboard) and Actions (user request approvals) pages
features.implementation: Page ID 670 at /managers/actions/ with user_requests_table shortcodes
features.notes: Track Actions page - extensible for future activity types beyond user registrations

features.title: Operator Actions Page with Data Filtering
features.description: Operator equivalent of Manager Actions with filtered data (public roles only, assigned-to-me logic)
features.notes: Data filtering: Operators see only Candidate/Employer requests, only unassigned OR assigned to them. Uses operator_requests_table shortcode (v1.2.0)

features.title: Manager/Operator Separate Shortcodes
features.description: Split shortcode logic - manager_requests_table (no filtering) and operator_requests_table (role + assignment filtering)
features.notes: Reduces complexity by separating Manager (all data) and Operator (filtered) logic into dedicated shortcodes
